# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(csgo_hacker LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(csgo_hacker "")
set_target_properties(csgo_hacker PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "csgo_hacker")
set_target_properties(csgo_hacker PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
add_dependencies(csgo_hacker win32_utils)
target_include_directories(csgo_hacker PRIVATE
    win32_utils/include
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(csgo_hacker PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(csgo_hacker PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(csgo_hacker PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(Gcc)
    target_compile_options(csgo_hacker PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET csgo_hacker PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(csgo_hacker PRIVATE
    win32_utils
)
target_link_directories(csgo_hacker PRIVATE
    build/windows/x64/release
)
target_sources(csgo_hacker PRIVATE
    game_hacker/src/main.cpp
    game_hacker/src/model.h
)

# target
add_library(win32_utils STATIC "")
set_target_properties(win32_utils PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "win32_utils")
set_target_properties(win32_utils PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_precompile_headers(win32_utils PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/win32_utils/windows/x64/release/win32_utils/include/pch.h>
)
target_include_directories(win32_utils PRIVATE
    win32_utils/include
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(win32_utils PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(win32_utils PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(win32_utils PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(Gcc)
    target_compile_options(win32_utils PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET win32_utils PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(win32_utils PRIVATE
    win32_utils/src/raii.cpp
    win32_utils/src/win32_helper.cpp
    win32_utils/include/pch.h
    win32_utils/include/raii.h
    win32_utils/include/win32_helper.h
)
